item.title: Controlling a display based on a PIR motion detector
item.description: I am working on a Magic Mirror: that’s an old LCD display behind a two-way mirror. The mirror shows your reflection when you look at it, but all light coming from behind it passes through - so stuff displayed on the LCD appears on the mirror. A Raspberry Pi 3 controls what is shown using this open source modular smart mirror platform. Of course I don’t want the display to be always on - that’d be bad for my electricity bill.
